Detailed Description

A widget displaying/manipulating DzNumericNodeProperty objects.

A composite widget that is used for viewing and manipulating numeric node properties.

void DzStyledNumericNodePropertyWgt::valueTextChanged ( const QString &  text  )  [protected, virtual, slot]
